Title: Allows the town board of the town of North Hempstead to adopt a local law or ordinance providing for a residential parking permit system
Summary: Allows the town board of the town of North Hempstead to adopt a local law or ordinance providing for a residential parking permit system on a certain street within the town.
LawCode: Add ยง1662-f, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing a residential parking system in the town of North Hempstead
